name: Russian Ukraine War
query: russia* AND ukrain* AND (war OR conflict)

name: Rojava–Islamist conflict
query: (rojava OR (kurdistan and syria*)) AND (war OR conflict)

name: Mexican Drug War
query: mexico AND drug AND (war OR conflict)

name: Insurgency In the Maghreb
query: (maghreb OR morocco) AND (war OR conflict OR insurgency)

name: Gaza–Israel conflict
query: gaza AND israel AND (war OR conflict)
